newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Bank of Korea to supply 800 bln won through repos.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Korea to supply 800 bln won through repos.

text.p: South Korea's central Bank of Korea said it would supply 800 billion won through repurchase agreements on Tuesday.
The money supply was aimed at bringing down the interest rates on the short-term money markets, a bank official said.
Overnight call rates rose to 12.10 percent on Monday, up from 11.30 percent on Saturday after the central bank absorbed 1.4 trillion won through repurchase agreements, brokers said.
